Reviews.Title: windos mobile7 disadvantage
Reviews.Author: Abuans
Reviews.Content: I WROTE THIS REVIEW AFTER USING THE MOBIL PHONE FOR SEVEN(7)DAYS I WAS SURPRISED THAT MICROSOFT PROVIDED ZUNE PROGRAM FOR SYNCHRONIZATION BETWEEN WINDOWS PHONE7 AND PC.HOWEVER IT SYNCHRONZE ONLY SONGS,PICTURES AND MOVIES.WHAT ABOUT OTHER PROGRAMS SUCH AS,DOCMENTS,ETC. THER IS NO BACKUP UTILITY.I WANTED TO SEND PICTURE VIA BLUETOOTH IT DOES NOT SUPPORT,GPS WORKS ONLY WITH SIM INSTALED.VOLUE IS LOW.FOREXAMPLE I USED TO USE WINDOWS MOBILE 6.1 SYNC. WITH THIS, I COULD TRANSFER ANY PROGRAM,DOCMENT,NAVIGITOR 2 ETC. TO MY MOBILE PHONE AND VISE VERSA. WITH WINDOWS7 CAN ONLY COMUNICATE WITH PC FOR ONLY SONGS,PICTURES AND MOVIES.
